mapper.select: select r.record_no recordNo, r.course_no courseNo, r.user_no userNo, c.title, r.review, to_char(r.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, i.file_path filePath from course c, record r left outer join (select * from record_img where order_no = 0) i on r.record_no = i.record_no where r.course_no = c.course_no and r.user_no = #{userNo} order by r.reg_date asc
select cate_no cateNo, user_no userNo, cate_name cateName from favorite_category where user_no = #{userNo} order by cate_no asc
select cate_no cateNo, user_no userNo, cate_name cateName from favorite_category
